Class TeamInfo

java.lang.Object
TeamInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scoreable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Basketball, Football, Hockey, Soccer
public abstract class TeamInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scoreable
TeamInfo is an abstract superclass that implements the scorable interface. Here is where all the methods are defined
